about_webmaker_login.message: At Webmaker, we’re tired of forgotten and weak passwords, so we made this new experience. If you prefer, you can set a password from your profile page.

sign_in_and_remember.description: Sign in and remember me button text

copy_key.message: Or, copy this temporary key into Webmaker:
copy_key.description: Text displayed next to the temporary login key

key_expiry_message.message: This link will stop working in 30 minutes. If you didn’t try to log in, you can ignore this message.
key_expiry_message.description: A message describing the key expiry time
